long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly manage, organize, and declutter your browser tabs with Tab Organizer & Manager! This powerful extension helps you categorize, search, group, and close duplicate tabs, making your browsing experience more productive and stress-free.

Key Features:
Group Tabs by Category: Automatically group your tabs into categories like Work, Social, Research, and a special Developers Group (including popular sites like GitHub, Stack Overflow, Geeks for Geeks, and more).

Arrange Tabs Alphabetically: Tired of tabs being in a random order? Use the Arrange Tabs feature to sort your tabs alphabetically and group them for easier navigation.

Close Duplicate Tabs: Instantly highlight and close duplicate tabs to reduce clutter and free up memory. Keep your browser running smoothly without redundant open tabs!

Tab Search: Quickly find the tab you need by searching through open tabs by title or URL. Switch between tabs with just one click from the search results.

Ungroup Tabs: Reset your tab groups anytime by ungrouping them with a single click, giving you full control over how your tabs are organized.

Developer-Friendly Tab Grouping: Dedicated to developers? We've got you covered with a group specifically for your dev resources like GitHub, Stack Overflow, Prettier, and more, keeping all your essential tools in one place.

Why You'll Love It:
Save time by keeping your tabs organized and reducing tab overload.
Increase productivity by grouping and sorting tabs automatically.
Eliminate duplicate tabs, improving browser performance and preventing confusion.
